thread.title: States’ rights trump transgender rights, but not on legal pot
thread.title_full: States’ rights trump transgender rights, but not on legal pot | Newsday

author: William Goldschlag and Dan Janison
title: States’ rights trump transgender rights, but not on legal pot
text:
advertisement | advertise on newsday
U.S. President Donald Trump speaks during a listening session on domestic and international human trafficking on Thursday, Feb. 23, 2017 in the Roosevelt Room of the White House in Washington, D.C. (Olivier Douliery/Abaca Press/TNS) (Credit: TNS / Olivier Douliery)
Smoke and bathroom mirrors
When asked about it last year, Donald Trump said he would have no problem letting Caitlyn Jenner, formerly Bruce Jenner, choose a restroom based on her gender identity if she visited Trump Tower.
So why the rollback of Obama administration rules on bathroom and locker room access for transgender kids in schools?
“The president believes it’s a states’...
